00112 #ifndef DF_CROSS_ENTROPY_H

00115 #include <cmath>
00116 #include "ReClaM/ModelInterface.h"

00118 //===========================================================================
00171 class DF_CrossEntropy : virtual public ModelInterface {
00172     // This value is used instead of log of a small number to avoid numerical instabilities. 
00173   // This value is chosen, as minLog = log(0) on a unix system.
00174   const static double minLog=-730;
00175   const static double maxDeriv=1e300;
00176   const static double maxexp=1e300;
00177  public:
00178 
00179 //===========================================================================
00210   double error(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &target) {
00211     double ce=0;
00212     double smaxsum;
00213      if (outputDimension>1)
00214       // more then one output neuron
00215       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00216         //std::cout << "error: Hallo 1-Out 1-pattern!" << std::endl;
00217         Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00218         model(in, output);
00219         smaxsum=smaxnorm(output);
00220         output/=smaxsum;
00221         for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(0); c++)
00222           if(target(c) != 0) 
00223             if(output(c) != 0.)
00224               ce -= target(c) * log( output(c) ) ;
00225             else
00226               ce -= minLog;
00227       } else {
00228         //std::cout << "error: Hallo x-Out x-pattern!" << std::endl;
00229         Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00230         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00231           model(in[pattern], output);
00232           smaxsum=smaxnorm(output);
00233           output/=smaxsum;
00234           for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(1); c++)
00235             if(target(pattern, c) != 0)
00236               if(output(c) != 0.) 
00237                 ce -= target(pattern, c) * log( output(c) );
00238               else
00239                 ce -= minLog;   
00240         }
00241       }
00242     else{
00243       // only one output neuron
00244       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00245         //std::cout << "error: Hallo 1-Out 1-pattern!" << std::endl;
00246         // one pattern
00247         Array<double> output(1);
00248         model(in, output);
00249         if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0)!=0))
00250           ce -= (target(0)*log(output(0)) + (1. - target(0)) * log(1. - output(0)));
00251         else if (output(0)!=target(0))
00252           ce -= minLog;
00253       } else {
00254         // more then one pattern
00255         //std::cout << "error: Hallo 1-Out x-pattern!" << std::endl;
00256         Array<double> output(1);
00257         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00258           model(in[pattern], output);
00259           if ((output(0) != 0) && (1. - output(0)!=0))
00260             ce -= target(pattern, 0) * log(output(0)) + (1. - target(pattern, 0)) * log(1. - output(0));
00261           else if (output(0) != target(pattern, 0))
00262             ce -= minLog;         
00263         }
00264       }
00265     }
00266     return ce;
00267   }
00268   
00269 //===========================================================================
00315   double derror(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &target, bool returnError = true) {
00316     dedw = 0;
00317     double ce = 0;
00318     double smaxsum;
00319     double isconsistent = 0;
00320 
00321     if (outputDimension > 1) {
00322       // more then one output neuron
00323       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00324         // one input pattern
00325         //std::cout << "derror: Hallo x-Out 1-pattern!" << std::endl;
00326         Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00327         coeffs.resize(output.nelem(),false);
00328         model(in, output);
00329         smaxsum=smaxnorm(output);
00330         output/=smaxsum;
00331         if (returnError){
00332           // calculate cross entropy
00333           for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++)
00334             if(target(c) != 0) 
00335               if(output(c) != 0.)
00336                 ce -= target(c) * log( output(c) ) ;
00337               else
00338                 ce -= minLog;
00339         }
00340         // calculate derivative dedw
00341         for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++){
00342           isconsistent += target(c);
00343           coeffs(c) = (target(c) - output(c));
00344         }
00345         if(isconsistent !=1){
00346           std::cerr << std::endl << "DF_Crossentropy: teacher labels do not sum to unity!" <<std::endl;
00347           exit(0);
00348         }
00349         df(coeffs, dedw);
00350       } else {
00351         // more than one input pattern
00352         //std::cout << "derror: Hallo x-Out x-pattern!" << std::endl;
00353         Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00354         coeffs.resize(output.nelem(),false);
00355         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00356           isconsistent = 0;
00357           model(in[pattern], output);
00358           smaxsum=smaxnorm(output);
00359           output/=smaxsum;
00360           if (returnError){
00361             // calculate cross-entropy
00362             for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++)
00363               if(target(pattern, c) != 0)
00364                 if(output(c) != 0.) 
00365                   ce -= target(pattern, c) * log( output(c) );
00366                 else
00367                   ce -= minLog; 
00368           }
00369           // calculate derivative dedw      
00370           for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++){
00371             isconsistent += target(pattern,c);
00372             coeffs(c) = (target(pattern,c) - output(c));
00373           }
00374           if(isconsistent !=1){
00375             std::cerr << std::endl << "DF_Crossentropy: teacher labels do not sum to unity!" << std::endl;
00376             exit(0);
00377           }
00378           df(coeffs,dedw);
00379         }
00380       }
00381     } else {
00382       // one output neuron
00383       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00384         // only one pattern
00385         //std::cout << "derror: Hallo 1-Out 1-pattern!" << std::endl;
00386         Array<double> output(1);
00387         coeffs.resize(output.nelem(),false);
00388         model(in, output);
00389         if (returnError){
00390           // calculate ce
00391           if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0)!=0))
00392             ce -= (target(0) * log(output(0)) + (1. -target(0)) * log(1. - output(0)));
00393           else if (output(0) != target(0)) 
00394             ce -= minLog;
00395         }
00396         // calculate derivative dedw
00397         if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0) != 0)){
00398           coeffs(0) = (target(0) - output(0)) / (output(0) * (1. - output(0)));
00399           df(coeffs, dedw);
00400         } else { 
00401           if (output(0) != target(0)){
00402             // the sign changes due to the value of the target,
00403             coeffs(0) = (2. * target(0) - 1.) * maxDeriv;
00404             df(coeffs, dedw);
00405           }
00406         }
00407       } else {
00408         // a number of patterns
00409         //std::cout << "derror: Hallo 1-Out x-pattern!" << std::endl;
00410         Array<double> output(1);
00411         coeffs.resize(output.nelem(),false);
00412         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00413           model(in[pattern], output);//
00414           if (returnError){
00415             // calculate ce
00416             if ((output(0) != 0) && (1. - output(0) != 0))
00417               ce -= target(pattern, 0) * log(output(0)) + (1. - target(pattern, 0)) * log(1. - output(0));
00418             else  if (output(0)!=target(pattern,0))
00419               ce -= minLog;
00420           }
00421           // calculate derivative dedw
00422           if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0)!=0)){
00423             coeffs(0) =(target(pattern, 0)-output(0)) / (output(0) * (1. - output(0)));
00424             df(coeffs, dedw);
00425           } else { 
00426             if (output(0) != target(pattern, 0)){
00427               // the sign changes due to the value of the target, maxDeriv is devided by reason of computational bounds
00428               coeffs(0)=(2. * target(pattern, 0) - 1.) * maxDeriv / in.dim(0);
00429               df(coeffs, dedw);
00430             }
00431           }
00432         }
00433       }
00434     }
00435     if (!returnError)
00436       ce = -1;
00437     return ce;
00438   }
00439 
00440  private:
00441   double norm(Array<double> &output) {
00442     double sum = 0;
00443     if(output.ndim() == 1) {
00444       for(unsigned i = 0; i < output.nelem(); i++) sum += output(i);
00445     } else {
00446       exit(1);
00447     }
00448     return sum;
00449   }
00450 
00451   double smaxnorm(Array<double> &output) {
00452     double sum = 0;
00453     if(output.ndim() == 1) {
00454       for(unsigned i = 0; i < output.nelem(); i++) {
00455         if(output(i)<301) output(i)=exp(output(i));
00456         else output(i)=maxexp/output.nelem();
00457         sum += output(i);
00458       }
00459     } else {
00460       exit(1);
00461     }
00462     return sum;
00463   }
00464   Array<double> coeffs;  
00465 
00466 };
00467 #endif
